name: ARPB_TX_CHG_LVL_FO
description: Transaction charge level filing order information.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: CHARGE_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHG_LVL_FO_CVG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the charge level filing order coverage

columns.name: CHG_LVL_FO_EXP_PMT
columns.description: This item stores the charge level filing order expected payment

columns.name: CHG_LVL_FO_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the charge level filing order authorization number

columns.name: CHG_LVL_FO_WO_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the charge level filing order write-off amount.
